text: hi everyone my name is Kristen Sarah and
I am a full time traveler one of the
most common questions that I get is how
do I get to travel so often my short
answer to that is travel is my passion
so I choose to make travel one of my top
priorities I truly believe that whatever
you are passionate about whatever your
dream is you can do it if you put
everything all of yourself into it if
you want to travel for two weeks out of
the year a month over the year or just
indefinitely you can do it
as for the longer answer - how do I get
to travel so often I am a full time
travel blogger and vlogger I started
this journey five years ago just over
five years now and it hasn't always been
the case where I've been able to do this
full-time
so let's go to the beginning and start
from there five years ago I was planning
a 10-month trip around the world and
before I left on that trip I wanted to
start a travel blog I had no idea what I
was doing at all I had no idea this time
travel blog so I was learning everything
from scratch so literally for about a
month and a half I was spending morning
till night while working a serving job
as well as a job a full-time job
edgy adventures creating trips for
people I would spend countless hours in
front of the computer googling how to
make a travel blog I was learning how to
do HTML coding and how to build a
template and how to choose a domain name
and how to go about behind a domain
everything that you basically need to do
to start a blog so after a lot of trial
and error I had created hopscotch the
globe calm I had bought a domain I had
created a template I have
- did I even drew my own logo scanned it
and then colored it in Photoshop and I
was so impressed and excited and happy
with the end result and I was so excited
to share with my friends and family I
started hopscotch the globe calm so that
my friends and family could follow my
adventures throughout these ten months
and little did I know it would turn into
what it is today which is this amazing
community of adventurers of travelers
from all around the world and how that
all started was during those 10 months
that I was traveling I started to
receive emails from people I didn't know
from all over the world telling me that
I had inspired them asking me for tips
and advice on travel and telling you
that they hadn't even quit their job and
also that I had even changed their life
when someone says to me that I have
changed their life that is the most
incredible compliment that I can receive
I mean I'm not here to change the world
but if I can change a few lives that
like that's magical that's amazing that
is why I'm doing what I'm doing so after
those 10 months I came home and I
continued to blog about those past
adventures as well as share my tips and
advice based on on my travels and what I
had learned along the way so I would
work serving and then I would save my
money and I would use that money to
invest in my blog and invest in more
travel in my youtube channel and new
equipment and so all the money I was
making I just put back into my blog my
passion I just love doing this this
thing this hobby I was not getting paid
for three years into blogging at all
wasn't making any money now fast forward
to January 2014 I remember the day
perfectly um it was the beginning of
January and I
had just came back from my first paid
gig um my first paid trip going
somewhere to document a destination and
did I created the itinerary with this
the destination so I suggested all the
things I wanted to do so it's basically
a trip that I plant I planned everything
myself yet I had someone investing in me
and investing in my work in my video in
my writing um and and paying me to share
this so share my adventure so I remember
the day I came back from that trip and I
was like oh my god like I just got paid
to travel I just got paid to do the one
thing that I loved so much in this world
and I got paid to travel and make videos
I remember this perfectly clear walking
into my serving job going straight to my
boss and saying I quit and the reason
why is because I am pursuing this
blogging thing and then I headed
straight to the bar got a beer cm at me
with a friend we Cheers
and um yeah that is the beginning of
this crazy adventure that I have been on
for the last two years I remember after
that celebration after having of that
extra delicious beer heading home and
filming a video titled I quit my job and
sharing the news with all of you and I
was scared but also felt wonderful
scared because I mean I had only made a
little bit of money on this one gig from
my blog and that is it and I just quit
my job to pursue blogging full-time and
it was terrifying
but exhilarating because I was pursuing
my dreams and I was taking a chance and
I knew if I wanted to do this full-time
I had to give myself to it whole time
and since then it's been an incredible
journey and I wouldn't
have it any other way now what I just
shared with you is the short version of
my blogging story but I'm going to be
diving deeper into it and sharing way
more with you in this series I'm going
to be sharing everything with you in the
series about what it takes to be a
travel blogger I'm going to be sharing
the incredible opportunities that I've
gotten as a result of being a blogger as
well as the struggles and the hardships
that come with being a blogger that not
many people talk about this series is
going to be for those of you who are
interested in creating a blog and it
doesn't necessarily have to be a travel
blog it can be a fashion blog or food
blog or whatever kind of blog you will
still benefit from this series this is
dedicated to those of you who want to
have that flexibility the opportunity to
be your own boss make your own schedule
and travel the world if you want want to
endlessly now in order for this series
to work I am going to need your help
I need you to leave all of your
questions that you have about blogging
and creating an online business in the
comment section below
it doesn't matter what type of question
it is don't be afraid ask anything you
want and I will be turning these
questions into individual episodes which
I will be releasing each week I am
really excited about this series I hope
you are too and remember we're creating
this together so make sure to leave your
comments below leave your questions
below and I will see you next week wait
before you go anywhere don't forget to
subscribe so you never miss out on any
upcoming adventures happy travels
